Pink Jeep Tours is the longest running, and the largest off-road adventure company in the US. We recently celebrated our 50th year anniversary in Sedona, Arizona where it all began. Since 1960, hundreds of thousands of passengers have headed out into the Southwest outback, witnessing spectacular places they could never have imagined. Their recommendations to family and friends are the hallmark of our operation. “You Gotta Do It!”

EPIC Research & Diagnostics is working on solutions to help physicians pinpoint problems before their patients notice any symptoms, and to help guide physicians in the right direction when symptoms and test results may not necessarily add up. With less time spent searching, EPIC’s vision is to help physicians make therapeutic and lifestyle recommendations that are specific to each and every patient while tracking treatment efficacy and progression over time.
Design and development of the SaaS based offering called HomeMinders.

recommendations: Andy is a rare breed of technology professional. He knows how to get things done the right way, on time and either at or below budget. He's truly a doer. Perhaps the biggest surprise about Andy is his exceptional ability to interact with customers, sales prospects, teammates, investors and board members. He excels at solving technology and business problems. Andy has an instinctive understanding of what it takes to build the business and how technology can be used to make a business successful whether it's launching a new product or supporting customers. I especially appreciated his effort to develop and maintain detailed project plans that directed the team, minimize wasted effort and enabled him to produce accurate progress reports. He knows how to build a productive, quality and loyal team that works and plays hard. There is nothing during my time with Andy that he was not able to accomplish. He impressed Pfizer so much that that they went way out of their way to recruit him very hard to join their Pfizer Health Solutions team out of New York.  He's a rare breed and a good guy.
